ccaffeine.BabelMain Interface Reference

To write ccaffeine-free code based on the CCA-specification and run it in any framework, wrap the code in this interface. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

void driverBody (inout gov.cca.AbstractFramework af)

Detailed Description

To write ccaffeine-free code based on the CCA-specification and run it in any framework, wrap the code in this interface.

From the gov.cca.AbstractFramework, everything else needed to manage a set of components (BuilderService, etc) can be obtained.

Parameters:
af an instance of AbstractFramework with the implementation type hidden by this interface.
